desc: Sets the region that the GPU can draw on.

usage.name: Enable clipping:

args.name: x
args.desc: The top-left X coord of the clipping area.

args.name: y
args.desc: The top-left Y coord of the clipping area.

args.name: w
args.desc: The width of the clipping area.

args.name: h
args.desc: The height of the clipping area.

usage.note: The arguments can be passed in a table.
